remarks: Two ways to express 3 non-colinear atoms (rotated right 2 places). (Contributed by NM, 12-Jul-2012.)
statement:
3noncol.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
3noncol.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
3noncol.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
3noncolr2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ -. R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) -> ( Q =/= R /\ -. P .<_ ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) $.
